page.title: 09RURAL EDUCATION IN N-E LEIC.
page.content: There are no schools in the immediate vicinity so children have to be trans ported by car or bus. {Pre-school}children attend playgroups at Thorpe Satchville or Tilton-on-the Hill.These are run privately as there is no state provision for under-5s here. {Junior education}(ages 5-11years) is at Great Dalby or Tilton-on-the -hill Primary schools. {Secondary}schooling(11-18 years) is at Melton Mowbray or Oakham. {Buses}are provided for children attending state schools by the Local Education Authority within their catchment area. A few parents opt for{private {education}in Leicester or Oakham.
